data.text:
@juliaoftoronto I’m 61, in Kingston ON, and scheduled for the AZ shot Friday. I’m tempted to wait and get one of the mRNA ones later, less because of blood clots than the overall bad vibes around AZ at this point. 

I doubt I’m alone.

Unlike UK/Europe, the US FDA didn't authorized the AstraZeneca vaccine yet and demanded a US trial. Those data are under review. It'll be important to see what FDA decides.

https://t.co/ZnUaBkUV8m
Context and links in here via @hildabast https://t.co/c1T3ehXqix and https://t.co/M7r7pP1Rpa
